title: Burgtec ride higher w/ new Josh Bryceland signature 50mm riser alloy handlebar
content:
British MTB component manufacturers, Burgtec, have released a new 50mm rise Ride High handlebar at the behest of Josh Bryceland. Building on the original 38mm rise bar developed for Ratboy, they get the same 9° backsweep and 5° upsweep on a 800mm wide alloy bar. Burgtec 50mm Rise Josh Bryceland Signature Bar Josh Bryceland, or […]

The post Burgtec ride higher w/ new Josh Bryceland signature 50mm riser alloy handlebar appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
